name: Have I met you somewhere before? - Director's Cut Edition
name_original: Have I met you somewhere before? - Director's Cut Edition
description:
Alone at night.
Walking in the rain.
Left by his girlfriend.

A lost Mads Mikkelsen's lookalike is searching for love on a solitary night. Wandering through the city he finds himself in a speed-dating session, encountering people that are more than meets the eye.

Will you help him find love?

Features

5 romanceable characters
9 endings
~30min. for 100% completion
Music from Bensound.com

If you enjoyed the game leave us a rating!
